Subskills.name: Raging Power
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by throw.

Subskills.name: Ragesling
Subskills.description: Throws the monster faster, dealing massively increased damage to it and causing it to explode into meat chunks that deal damage to nearby monsters if it dies from the throw.

Subskills.name: Power Throw
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed of throw.

Subskills.name: Colossal Liftoff
Subskills.description: Increases throw's damage by a portion of monsters maximum life.

Subskills.name: Flipper
Subskills.description: Thrown monsters bounce off of walls increasing damage dealt with every bounce.

Subskills.name: Power Fall
Subskills.description: Thrown monsters smash into the ground with force causing ground fragments to fly around dealing damage.

Subskills.name: Breaking Fall
Subskills.description: Thrown monsters inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Echoing Throw
Subskills.description: When thrown monster lands it shocks the ground multiple times with increased damage.

Subskills.name: Bouncing Around
Subskills.description: Thrown monster bounce off the ground dealing increased damage with every bounce.

Subskills.name: Bulls Eye
Subskills.description: When directly hitting another monster, cause the monster to be knocked up dealing area of effect damage when landing.

Subskills.name: Dive Bomb
Subskills.description: Increases landing area of effect radius of throw.

Subskills.name: Vacuum Pitch
Subskills.description: When thrown monster lands it pulls nearby monsters towards it.

Subskills.name: Dimensional Pitch
Subskills.description: Additionally throw shadow copies of the monster with increased damage.
